oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A new doc in town: Onboarding, technical skills, and assimilation into practice

new grad
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Are your new doctors getting a great start? How do you keep the good ones? Itâ€™s not just money. Training and support is critical for new doctors to like their job. A welcoming community and a work schedule that allows doctors to be part of it is a big contribution to practice longevity.
